personalInfo.name: Tony Tong
personalInfo.title: Cloud Operations | SRE | DevOps | Cloud & Infrastructure

summary: Cloud Operations Engineer experienced in building and operating highly available AWS and Kubernetes-based platforms at scale. Skilled in CI/CD automation, infrastructure as code, and monitoring, with a strong focus on reliability, operational efficiency, and continuous improvement across production environments.

experience.title: Cloud Operations Engineer II
achievements: Own and operate large-scale AWS infrastructure for Jamf Pro, administering 30,000+ production instances across 100+ EKS clusters serving 33 million users with high availability and reliability.
Design, deploy, and operate cross-cloud CI/CD pipelines and workflows to manage Jamf Pro microservices across AWS and Azure.
Drive monitoring and observability strategy using Prometheus, Grafana, LogicMonitor, and New Relic to proactively identify issues and improve production stability.
Build cloud automation and internal tooling in Python and Go (CLI tools/APIs) to automate diagnostics and operational workflows for internal engineers.
Serve as a primary escalation point for critical production incidents, leading response, root cause analysis, and long-term remediation.

experience.title: System Engineer
achievements: Designed and rolled out monitoring and alerting platforms for hundreds of gateways, enabling earlier threat detection and stronger security visibility.
Built and maintained GitLab CI/CD pipelines to automate build, test, and release processes and improve deployment reliability.
Developed and standardized automation scripts and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Terraform to provision and manage scalable, repeatable infrastructure.
Led network migration projects including on-prem to AWS transitions with minimal downtime and clear rollback strategies.

experience.title: Network Engineer
achievements: Designed and operated large-scale enterprise network infrastructures, ensuring high availability, performance, and security.
Owned routing, switching, and network security, implementing BGP, OSPF, VLANs, ACLs, NAT, and firewalls across on-prem and cloud environments.
Implemented network security solutions including firewalls, IDS/IPS, DDoS protection, and network segmentation to mitigate cyber threats.
Automated network provisioning and compliance using Ansible, Terraform, and scripting to minimize manual effort and configuration drift.

experience.title: IoT System Engineer
achievements: Designed and deployed industrial IoT systems using Zigbee wireless networks to connect large-scale IoT devices in industrial environments.
Integrated Modbus, Zigbee, and 4G/LTE connectivity to enable reliable data transmission between field devices, gateways, and backend systems.
Built and configured IoT gateways to aggregate sensor data, manage device communication, and ensure stable operation in harsh environments.
Troubleshot wireless interference, connectivity issues, and protocol-level failures to improve network reliability and uptime.
